question: You work at home and have a problem with a piece of equipment that you use for your job.Write a letter to the shop or company which supplied the equipment. In your letter •	Describe the problem with the equipment •	Explain how this problem is affecting your work•	Say what you want the shop or company to do
text: I am writing this letter to inform you about my dissatisfaction with my laptop that was supplied by your company.

To be more precise, the keyboard that was fit on my laptop doesn’t work properly and even I am unable to type to get the correct words. This leads me to take too long for typing a single mail as I need to wait for a long time to get the correct alphabet. Moreover, another problem is that my computer screen  fluctuation and it happens every 30 minutes when I am using my laptop. Therefore, I was not able to accomplish all my work because of this hindrance.

Although I know that there is no warranty for my items, I would be grateful if your service centre could make amends for my computer by replacing it with a new keyboard and troubleshooting the issues of the screen fluctuation.
I am looking forward to getting your input on this issue.
